data.text: Solve the crossword puzzle. Take help from the clues provided. Click 'Submit' after completing the puzzle. Don't forget to watch the timer.
data.Question: a non-metallic mineral used in making fertilizers, cement, paper, and paints
Pakistan's second most important source of energy is ____ gas.
electricity produced from fast-flowing rivers
a non-metallic mineral used in cooking and preserving. ____ salt
the location of the first oilfield discovered in Pakistan
power generated from heat produced by burning oil, gas, or coal
a non-metallic mineral used in the production of lime, bleaching powder, and soap
a natural source from which energy can be generated
a non-metallic mineral used to make explosives, paints, and rayon
a non-metallic mineral used as decorative stone in buildings
fuel used to run cars, trucks, and buses
the only metallic mineral mined on a large scale in Pakistan
power plants that are expensive to build
fuel used in brick kilns
Press this button to check the word you have typed in the puzzle.
data.feedback: Oh no! That is not correct. Try again.
